full_summary:
### Treasury Board Tender
#### Solicitation Number: 21120-23-4265820
#### Amendment: 6

**Title**:
Insurance Course Training Sessions and Insurance Advice

**Deadline**:
Submit your tender by April 21, 2023, at 14:00 hours, local time.

**Period of Contract and Time Frame for Delivery**:
This contract commenced May 1, 2023, and will end April 30, 2024.

**Notice Type and Solicitation Method**:
* Solicitation type: Competitive bid
* Trade Agreement: None
* Set-aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business: None

**Summary of the Contract**:
The Correctional Service of Canada requires insurance training sessions for their employees. This training aims to educate employees on contract insurance requirements and security standards. On-demand services will also be provided to review contractors' insurance policies and ensure compliance with contract security requirements.

**Eligibility and Participation**:
All interested suppliers can submit a tender.

**Evaluation Criteria**:
The lowest priced compliant bid will be evaluated.

**Security Requirements**:
This tender includes security requirements.

**Statement of Work and Evaluation Criteria**:
The solicitation document and any related documents can be found on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

**Note to Bidders**:
The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on a procurement matter.

**Official Languages**:
Tenders may be submitted in either English or French.

**Contact Information**:
Danielle Blanchet, Contracting Authority:

Email: [Danielle.blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.blanchet@csc-scc.gc.ca)
Phone: (506) 377-9624

**Notice URL and Attachment**:
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4585/4265820---rfp---english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4585/4265820---rfp---english.pdf)
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4585/4265820--ddp---french_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4585/4265820--ddp---french_0.pdf)
